entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023
